Body:
code = [*create_instr('lt', 0, 1), *create_instr('lt', 1, 2), *create_instr
    ('lt', 1, 3)]
vm = Arkhe(code)
vm.registers[0] = 5
vm.registers[1] = 5
vm.exc_instr()
assert not vm._eqflag
vm.registers[2] = 10
vm.exc_instr()
assert vm._eqflag
vm.registers[3] = 4
vm.exc_instr()
assert not vm._eqflag
